All relevant user content (list of subscribed patreons, your feed)will be replaced with a spinning animation. > > I believe this is to be due to the Adguard Chinese filter blocking unpkg.com but I am not one hundred percent certain. issue.title: www.patreon.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.patreon.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.patreon.com) ### Comment Username: `@morby` > With the Adguard Chinese filter enabled, Patreon.com will not load correctly. This includes the home page when signed out disabling the login button with a spinning animation as well as disabling the Chinese filter, logging into a session, re-enabling the Chinese filter, then reloading the page. All relevant user content (list of subscribed patreons, your feed)will be replaced with a spinning animation. > > I believe this is to be due to the Adguard Chinese filter blocking unpkg.com but I am not one hundred percent certain. All I do know is disabling every other filter, save for adblocking ones, did not resolve the issue. Disabling the Adguard Chinese filter did. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/7fhws6T.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/ThU7Wn5.png)

comment.body:
Включите фильтр раздражителей и также нужно установить наш скрипт.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

issue.title: www.kinopoisk.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение 30-60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

issue.title: thwiki.cc
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://thwiki.cc/%E9%A6%96%E9%A1%B5](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fthwiki.cc%2F%25E9%25A6%2596%25E9%25A1%25B5) ### Comment Username: @whuihuan > 我是网站方的管理者，我需要为这一块内容解释一下。 > 这一块内容是网站的宣传轮播，因为本网站为东方project的社群维基，内容均与东方project相关。该轮播的作用是宣传东方相关的创作、引导购买正版东方project官方作品（如截图上的《东方文果真报》就是东方project官方发售的刊物）、网站公告（例如东方project作者ZUN的生日）、THBWiki附属项目（例如幻想乡柱状地图网页版、东方版人格测试、东方音乐索引站）等作用，并非是与站点内容无关的收益化广告。adguard错误的将其屏蔽会导致一些刚认识东方project的用户失去了解一些东方最新相关的内容，并且会对网站的布局产生影响（例如空了一大块），希望adguard团队能正确判断用户提交的广告举报，避免因为错误的举报导致网站正常功能使用收到影响。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/BUIUFCJ.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/2876rVl.jpg)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://reports-img.adguard.com/SHpOZzT.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.0.173 Browser: | EdgeChromium Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

AdGuard Chinese

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
@Alex-302 @AdamWr @BlazDT @zloyden @Sergey-Lyapin @jellizaveta
Please take a look, looks to be Admiral "hard" anti-adb
- The tipical one: `digitalmusicnews.com#%#//scriptlet("abort-current-inline-script", "document.createElement", "admiral")` but I don't see a button to dismiss.
- Potentially new one:
```
digitalmusicnews.com#%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "admrlLoaded", "true")
||succeedscene.com/ads_*/ads.load.js$script,redirect=noopjs,domain=digitalmusicnews.com,important
@@||||succeedscene.com/ads_*/ads.load.js$domain=digitalmusicnews.com
```
Can they be added to Base?

comment.body: C NoScript и без AdGuard все работает. Мне кажется дело даже не в конкретном фильтре, ведь вайтлист не решает проблему.

Please move to mobile. It is blocked by not optimized filter and I fixed it
```
!+ NOT_OPTIMIZED
_ad_content.
```

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Booking.com reservation emails
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

N/A

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

Booking.com reservation emails

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

"Modify your booking" gives a https://secure.booking.com/myreservations.en-gb.html?aid=000000;bn=0000000000;pincode=0000&;source=conf_email;pbsource=conf_email_modify;pbtrack=email_mainCTA like URL.

"As evident", booking.com uses a lot of `;` as parameter-separators (which I guess that we can do nothing about?)
e.g. "Get the print version" ends up in a https://secure.booking.com/myreservations.en-gb.html?auth_success=1;pbtrack=email_print_btn;pincode=0000;=;bn=0000000000;aid=000000;label=conf_email_print;pbsource=conf_email_modify;source=conf_email URL, which is "maybe non-parseable" by standard semantics

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
